item.title: An Asynchronous Model of Multitransmitter Neural Interactions
item.description:
A joint three-year project [laboratories no. 11 of the IPU RAS] (https://www.ipu.ru/) and [laboratories of developmental neurobiology of the IBR RAS] (http://www.idbras.ru/) to create a mathematical model of interneural interactions in living organisms. The model describes the rhythmic activities of simple nervous systems, which are based on the mechanism of transmitter-receptor specificity.

Main publications on the results of the project:

  • Bazenkov, N. I., Boldyshev, B. A., Dyakonova, V., & Kuznetsov, O. P. (2020). Simulating Small Neural Circuits with a Discrete Computational Model. Biological cybernetics, 114(3).

  • Kuznetsov, O. P., Bazenkov, N. I., Boldyshev, B. A., Zhilyakova, L. Y., Kulivets, S. G., & Chistopolsky, I. A. (2018). An asynchronous discrete model of chemical interactions in simple neuronal systems. Scientific and Technical Information Processing, 45(6), 375-389.
